Class SQLHelper

java.lang.Object
com.example.muhammad.chambers.c195.pa.dao.SQLHelper
public class SQLHelper extends Object
This class contains the common SQL code to pull data from the database.

    • updateForStrColumn

      public static int updateForStrColumn(String tableName, String primaryKeyIdColumnName, int primaryKeyId, String columnToUpdateName, String valueToUpdate) throws SQLException
      This is the updateForStrColumn method. This method updates a string column in the database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to update the row for
      primaryKeyIdColumnName - the tables primary key column name
      primaryKeyId - the tables primary key column id value
      columnToUpdateName - the name of the column to update
      valueToUpdate - the value to replace in the column
      Returns:
      Returns an integer as to how many rows were affected
      Throws:
      SQLException - due to the SQL queries
